oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Arab Identity: Who are the Arabs?
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color, 27 min. A BBC documentary With some interesting footage of the pilgrimage, of Palestinians in south Lebanon (ca. 1975), and of the funeral of Urn Kalthum in Cairo. The stress is on the variety of the Arab world, and yet on the unifying factors (religious and cultural, also political as in the case of the Palestinian cause). It is a western attempt to explain Arabs sympathetically to westerners.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Learning Corporation of America.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Ethnographic and Anthropological Films - Egypt and Beyond
